file_content.text: House Thul is in the Empire's debt once more.
Finally, some pleasant news from House Alde. There was a scuffle, and certain records were lost.
You were able to access the Alde computers?
Then you did your part.
Perfectly, thanks to you, and their lies have been deleted.
There was more than a scuffle.
Happy to help.
If all Thul's allies were so generous, we would rule Alderaan. We may yet.
Plant the computer spikes and erase House Alde's lies.
My lord. House Thul is honored to call you an ally. Your strength will bring the truth to light.
Sir. House Thul must once again ask help of its allies.
My lord. Your reputation as a scholar precedes you. Ancient artifacts, hidden knowledge. Truly, you are truth's champion.
Hunter. I have work for you if you're interested. Work of the highest importance.
Excuse me. House Thul must once again respectfully ask the Empire for its help.
Our enemies are spreading lies about us to justify the gross miscarriage of justice that resulted in House Thul's exile from Alderaan.
They are altering the very histories of this planet and forever tarnishing our name.
House Thul has my support.
Then you have House Thul's gratitude, and loyalty.
You're over-reacting.
The dignity of my house is at stake, as well as our ongoing security on Alderaan.
Who is responsible for these lies?
They?
House Alde, doubtless at the behest of House Organa, has been poisoning the histories with false records of Thul's so-called "crimes against Alderaan."
They have refused my petition to correct the errors, and so my only option is to ask you to enter House Alde and do it personally.
They'll never know I was there.
Delightful.
As long as the errors are corrected.
This task is nothing. Give me the battlefield. Give me glory.
It's beneath me.
Information is its own battlefield. No army on Alderaan will fight for us if these lies remain.
Bust into the library, change a few records around. I can do that.
No problem.
House Thul will show its gratitude for your cooperation in credits.
I specialize in misinformation and altering the truth.
My kind of mission.
We are restoring the truth, not altering it.
Afraid of a few librarians?
If I go in, Thul will be blamed. If you go in, we can claim that the Empire acted on its own.
Why should I believe you?
The Empire's official stance is that House Thul was wrongly exiled. You're not accusing the Empire of lying?
Enter House Alde through the sub-tunnels and use these computer spikes--they will let me edit the Alde records remotely. Slay the guards to divert attention from our purpose.
There won't be a trace of these fictions left.
Consider it done.
I could try.
Thank you. House Thul is once again in the Empire's debt.
No, thank you. [Refuse quest]
Please reconsider. The good name of House Thul depends on it.
I'm sorry. I'm busy right now.
